parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time. The maximum time range that can be specified is seven days.

parameters.name: ExecuteCost
parameters.description: The execution duration of the SQL statement. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: ExecuteState
parameters.description:
The execution status of the query. Valid values:

*   1: successful.
*   0: failed.
*   0,1 or 1,0: all.

parameters.name: MaxExecuteCost
parameters.description: The maximum amount of time consumed by a slow query. Unit: seconds. Minimum value: 0.

parameters.name: MinExecuteCost
parameters.description: The minimum amount of time consumed by a slow query. Unit: seconds. Minimum value: 0.

parameters.name: OperationClass
parameters.description:
The type of the query language. Valid values:

*   **DQL**
*   **DML**
*   **DDL**
*   **DCL**
*   **TCL**

parameters.name: OperationType
parameters.description:
The type of the SQL statement.

> 

*   If you specify **OperationClass**, the value of **OperationType** must be of the corresponding query language. For example, if you set **OperationClass** to **DQL**, the value of **OperationType** must be a **DQL** statement such as **SELECT**.

*   If you leave **OperationClass** empty, the value of **OperationType** can be an SQL statement of any query language.

*   If you leave **OperationClass** and **OperationType** empty, all types of SQL statements are returned.

parameters.name: QueryKeywords
parameters.description: The keywords that are used to query audit logs.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The name of the database account that is used to connect to the database.
